column4: Today (2025-Aug-17) is Metageitniṓn 24, ἑβδόμῃ φθίνοντος Μεταγειτνιῶνος, day 53 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Aug-18) is Metageitniṓn 25, ἕκτῃ φθίνοντος Μεταγειτνιῶνος, day 54 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Aug-19) is Metageitniṓn 26, πέμπτῃ φθίνοντος Μεταγειτνιῶνος, day 55 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Aug-20) is Metageitniṓn 27, τετράδι φθίνοντος Μεταγειτνιῶνος, day 56 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Aug-21) is Metageitniṓn 28, τρίτῃ φθίνοντος Μεταγειτνιῶνος, day 57 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Aug-22) is Metageitniṓn 29, δευτέρᾳ φθίνοντος Μεταγειτνιῶνος, day 58 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Aug-23) is Metageitniṓn 30, ἕνῃ καὶ νέᾳ Μεταγειτνιῶνος, day 59 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Aug-24) is Boēdromiṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 60 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
This Boēdromiṓn will have 29 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) as opposed to a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) of 30.

Festivals in Boēdromiṓn:

5: Genesia (Γενέσια)
6: Marathon (Μαραθών)
7: Boedromia (Βοηδρόμια)
13–24: Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια)
Today (2025-Aug-25) is Boēdromiṓn 2, δευτέρᾳ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 61 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Aug-26) is Boēdromiṓn 3, τρίτῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 62 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Aug-27) is Boēdromiṓn 4, τετράδι ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 63 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Aug-28) is Boēdromiṓn 5, πέμπτῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 64 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
🏺 The Genesia (Γενέσια), a festival of the dead, was possibly celebrated on this day.\n\n
Today (2025-Aug-29) is Boēdromiṓn 6, ἕκτῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 65 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.

🏺 On this day, Athenians celebrated their victory over invading Persians at the battle of Marathon. The sixth of every month was sacred to Artemis, but since the Marathon celebration included a procession to Agrai, Boēdromiṓn 6 may have specifically been the festival of Artemis Agrotera\n\n
Today (2025-Aug-30) is Boēdromiṓn 7, ἑβδόμῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 66 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
🏺 The Boedromia (Βοηδρόμια) may have been celebrated this day in honor of Apollo Boedromios. The seventh of every month was sacred to Apollo.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boedromia
Today (2025-Aug-31) is Boēdromiṓn 8, ὀγδόῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 67 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-01) is Boēdromiṓn 9, ἐνάτῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 68 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-02) is Boēdromiṓn 10, δεκάτῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 69 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-03) is Boēdromiṓn 11, ἑνδεκάτῃ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 70 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-04) is Boēdromiṓn 12, δωδεκάτῃ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 71 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-05) is Boēdromiṓn 13, τρίτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 72 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
🏺 Kicking off the celebration of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια), on this day the epheboi (young men) made a procession to Eleusis.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-06) is Boēdromiṓn 14, τετράδι ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 73 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.

🏺 On this day, the epheboi (young men) who had made the procession to Eleusis the previous day made a procession back to Athens carrying the sacred objects to the Eleusinion.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-07) is Boēdromiṓn 15, πέμπτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 74 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
🏺 Today was the “agurmos” (ἀγυρμός, “Gathering”), the first day of the celebration of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια)\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-08) is Boēdromiṓn 16, ἕκτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 75 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
🏺 Today was the second day of the celebration of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια), “halade mustai” (ἅλαδε μύσται, “Initiates to the Sea”).\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-09) is Boēdromiṓn 17, ἑβδόμῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 76 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.

🏺 The Epidauria (Ἐπιδαύρια) was celebrated on this day, a festival for Asklepios, the god of healing, and sort of a separate festival within the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια).\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-10) is Boēdromiṓn 18, ὀγδόῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 77 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
🏺 The Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια) were still going on this day, but we are not sure what happened (they are secret rites, after all).\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-11) is Boēdromiṓn 19, ἐνάτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 78 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.

🏺 On this day there was a procession from the Eleusinion in Athens to Eleusis for the Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια). It began late in the day and did not arrive in Eleusis (about ten miles from Athens) until nighttime.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-12) is Boēdromiṓn 20, δεκάτῃ προτέρᾳ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 79 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.

🏺 Today was the first full day of celebrations of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια) that took place in Eleusis. What went on has been kept secret for thousands of years.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-13) is Boēdromiṓn 21, δεκάτῃ ὑστέρᾳ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 80 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.

🏺 Today was the second full day of celebrations of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια) that took place in Eleusis. No one ever leaked the secret of these mystery rites.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-14) is Boēdromiṓn 22, ἐνάτῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 81 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.

🏺 Today was still part of the celebration of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια). Everyone who knew what the rites were on this day took that knowledge to their grave.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-15) is Boēdromiṓn 23, ὀγδόῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 82 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.

🏺 There was a special meeting of the Athenian council at Eleusis on this day as part of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια), and initiates returned to Athens.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-16) is Boēdromiṓn 24, ἑβδόμῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 83 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.

🏺 On this day, the final part of the celebration of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια) was a meeting of the Athenian council in the Eleusinion in Athens.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2025-Sep-17) is Boēdromiṓn 25, ἕκτῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 84 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-18) is Boēdromiṓn 26, πέμπτῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 85 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-19) is Boēdromiṓn 27, τετράδι φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 86 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-20) is Boēdromiṓn 28, τρίτῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 87 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-21) is Boēdromiṓn 29, ἕνῃ καὶ νέᾳ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 88 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-22) is Puanopsiṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Πυανοψιῶνος, day 89 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
This Puanopsiṓn will have 30 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) as opposed to a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) of 29.

Festivals in Puanopsiṓn:

-1: Khalkeia (Xαλkεῖα)
6: Proerosia (Προηροσία)
6: Oskhoporia (Ὠσχοφόρια)
7: Pyanopsia (Πυανόψια)
8: Theseia (Θησεῖα)
9: Stenia (Στήνια)
11–13: Thesmophoria (Θεσμοφόρια)
Today (2025-Sep-23) is Puanopsiṓn 2, δευτέρᾳ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 90 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-24) is Puanopsiṓn 3, τρίτῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 91 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-25) is Puanopsiṓn 4, τετράδι ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 92 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-26) is Puanopsiṓn 5, πέμπτῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 93 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Sep-27) is Puanopsiṓn 6, ἕκτῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 94 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.

🏺 The Proerosia (Προηροσία) was probably celebrated on this day
The Oskhoporia (Ὠσχοφόρια) was celebrated on this day


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oschophoria
Today (2025-Sep-28) is Puanopsiṓn 7, ἑβδόμῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 95 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.

🏺 This was the day of the Pyanopsia (Πυανόψια) or “Festival of the Boiled Beans” when an offering of bean stew was made to Apollo. I know that sounds like a joke, but it’s real\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pyanopsia
Today (2025-Sep-29) is Puanopsiṓn 8, ὀγδόῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 96 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
🏺 The Theseia (Θησεῖα) was celebrated on this day with races and other competitions\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theseia
Today (2025-Sep-30) is Puanopsiṓn 9, ἐνάτῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 97 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
🏺 The Stenia (Στήνια), a festival devoted to Demeter and Persephone, occurred on this day. It was a carnivalesque festival celebrated by women at night.\n\n
Today (2025-Oct-01) is Puanopsiṓn 10, δεκάτῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 98 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Oct-02) is Puanopsiṓn 11, ἑνδεκάτῃ Πυανοψιῶνος, day 99 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
🏺 The first day (of three) of the Thesmophoria (Θεσμοφόρια), an important fertility festival the rituals for which were performed entirely by women.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thesmophoria
Today (2025-Oct-03) is Puanopsiṓn 12, δωδεκάτῃ Πυανοψιῶνος, day 100 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
🏺 The second day (of three) of the Thesmophoria (Θεσμοφόρια), an important fertility festival the rituals for which were performed entirely by women.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thesmophoria
Today (2025-Oct-04) is Puanopsiṓn 13, τρίτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Πυανοψιῶνος, day 101 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
🏺 The third and last day of the Thesmophoria (Θεσμοφόρια), an important fertility festival the rituals for which were performed entirely by women.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thesmophoria
Today (2025-Oct-05) is Puanopsiṓn 14, τετράδι ἐπὶ δέκα Πυανοψιῶνος, day 102 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Oct-06) is Puanopsiṓn 15, πέμπτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Πυανοψιῶνος, day 103 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Oct-07) is Puanopsiṓn 16, ἕκτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Πυανοψιῶνος, day 104 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Oct-08) is Puanopsiṓn 17, ἑβδόμῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Πυανοψιῶνος, day 105 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Oct-09) is Puanopsiṓn 18, ὀγδόῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Πυανοψιῶνος, day 106 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Oct-10) is Puanopsiṓn 19, ἐνάτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Πυανοψιῶνος, day 107 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Oct-11) is Puanopsiṓn 20, δεκάτῃ προτέρᾳ Πυανοψιῶνος, day 108 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Oct-12) is Puanopsiṓn 21, δεκάτῃ ὑστέρᾳ Πυανοψιῶνος, day 109 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Oct-13) is Puanopsiṓn 22, ἐνάτῃ φθίνοντος Πυανοψιῶνος, day 110 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Oct-14) is Puanopsiṓn 23, ὀγδόῃ φθίνοντος Πυανοψιῶνος, day 111 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
Today (2025-Oct-15) is Puanopsiṓn 24, ἑβδόμῃ φθίνοντος Πυανοψιῶνος, day 112 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
